message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,300,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,375,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still feel that $1,300,000 would be a fair price for me. I hope we can reach an agreement closer to my offer.
